title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: I was curator to this Nynwells' father, of which I, with Linthill, &c. are discharged.

title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: This backhand, Linthill, one of the friends concerned and bound for part of

title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: I had hkewise another occasion of staying at Edinburgh for Kimmerghame, which was a plea with Linthill ; and I commenced  the plea with Mr. Charles Home upon the articles of agreement between him and Kimmergheme.

title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: He was proprietor, among others, of the lands of Linthill in Berwickshire.
